import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import "./TweetList.css" import { connect } from "react-redux" import moment from "moment" function TweetList(props) { const [tweetList, setTweetList] = useState([]) const [like, setLike] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { const onLoadTweetList = () => { setTweetList(props.tweet_payload) } onLoadTweetList() }, [props.tweet_payload]) const handleLikeCounter = (tweet_id) => {} const data = tweetList.filter((list) => list._id === tweet_id) console.log(data) return (
    {tweetList.map((tweet, index) => (
  • {tweet.username}
    {moment( tweet.createdAt ).fromNow()}

    {tweet.tweet_body}

    {tweet.likes} like(s)
    {tweet.comments.length} comments
    Comment
    Retweet
    • ))}
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { tweet_payload: state.tweets, } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(TweetList)
